report.title: Occurrences Download using standard filters with parent samples
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the standard report filter parameters, with sample attributes in a parent sample.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id and occ.deleted=false -- to get sensitivity_precision JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=ils.location_type_id AND ctt.term='Vice County' ) on ils.sample_id=o.sample_id and ils.contains=true LEFT JOIN locations vc on vc.id=ils.location_id and coalesce(vc.code, '') not like '%+%' JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id JOIN users u ON u.id=o.created_by_id JOIN people p ON p.id=u.person_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of Habitat Level sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smp2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of Dive Level sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: uploadFolder
param.description: Image upload folder on the warehouse including the trailing slash

param.name: warehouse_id
param.description: Unique identifier code for the warehouse which can be prepended to occurrence IDs to make a globally unique record key

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when occ.sensitivity_precision is null then o.sample_id else null end

column.name: parent_sample_id
column.sql: case when occ.sensitivity_precision is null then s.parent_id else null end

column.name: location_name
column.sql: case when occ.sensitivity_precision is null and s.privacy_precision is null then o.location_name else 'Sensitive. Lat long is approximate.' end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then o.public_entered_sref else replace(o.public_entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else case length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')) when 5 then 2000 else pow(10, (12-length(replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '')))/2) end end

column.name: determiner
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.attr_det_full_name IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN o.attr_det_last_name IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE o.attr_det_last_name || COALESCE(', ' || o.attr_det_first_name, '') END ELSE o.attr_det_full_name END

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 1 THEN 'Accepted as correct' WHEN 2 THEN 'Accepted as considered correct' ELSE 'Accepted' END WHEN 'C' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 3 THEN 'Plausible' ELSE 'Record Submitted' END WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'R' THEN CASE o.record_substatus WHEN 4 THEN 'Rejected as considered incorrect' WHEN 5 THEN 'Rejected as incorrect' ELSE 'Rejected' END WHEN 'I' THEN 'Input still in progress' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE o.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: recorder_person_id
column.sql: case when o.recorders = p.surname || ', ' || p.first_name or o.recorders = p.first_name || ' ' || p.surname then cast(p.id as varchar(20)) else 'unknown' end

column.name: determiner_person_id
column.sql: case when o.recorders = o.attr_det_last_name || ', ' || o.attr_det_first_name or o.recorders = o.attr_det_first_name || ' ' || o.attr_det_last_name or o.recorders = o.attr_det_full_name then cast(p.id as varchar(20)) else 'unknown' end

column.name: images
column.sql: case when images is null then null else '#uploadFolder#' || replace(images, ',', ', #uploadFolder#') end
